title: Getyourself!
lyrics:
Lyric Hiro - Getyourself!

[Romanization]

tteonabeorija
joeul geot gata
amu saenggakdo da haji malgo

bireul majeumyeon
eotteol geot gata?
amado urineun ssodajil geoya

keoteun dwieseo seoro barabwasseo
amudo moreuge urin deouk gipeojyeonne
urin yeojeonhi usan soge sara
naerijido aneun bireul pihae sumeonna bwa

nan maeirui naeireul geonneoya
neoreul bol su itdaneun ge jichyeosseo
oneul bame byeori ssodajimyeon
teong bin naeirui neoman

Oh stop own your suicidal
And tryna your feelin' lighter
So why don't you get yourself with a smile?
(Don't you get yourself with a smile?)
Oh stop own your suicidal
And tryna your feelin' lighter
So why don't you get yourself with a smile?
(Don't you get yourself with a smile?)

neon gieok hal ji moreugetjiman
urin bireul matgo chumeul chwosseotji
geu sungganui bukkeureon pyojeongeun
saenggakboda nappeujineun anasseo

mudeowojin haetsal soge buldeon
geu baram han beoneun siwonhaetji
haengbogiran jamsi seuchyeoman gago
eonjena gipeosseo

Oh stop own your suicidal
And tryna your feelin' lighter
So why don't you get yourself with a smile?
(Don't you get yourself with a smile?)

Oh stop own your suicidal
And tryna your feelin' lighter
So why don't you get yourself with a smile?
(Don't you get yourself with a smile?)

Oh stop your act faking lier
That I know your true desire
So why you lost pieces of own your shine?

Oh stop your act faking lier
That I know your true desire
So why you lost pieces of own your shine?

(Oh stop your act faking lier that)
(I know your true desire)
(Oh stop your act fake lier that)

[Hangeul]

떠나버리자

좋을 것 같아

아무 생각도 다 하지 말고



비를 맞으면

어떨 것 같아?

아마도 우리는 쏟아질 거야



커튼 뒤에서 서로 바라봤어

아무도 모르게 우린 더욱 깊어졌네

우린 여전히 우산 속에 살아

내리지도 않은 비를 피해 숨었나 봐



난 매일의 내일을 건너야

너를 볼 수 있다는 게 지쳤어

오늘 밤에 별이 쏟아지면

텅 빈 내일의 너만



Oh stop own your suicidal

And tryna your feelin' lighter

So why don't you get yourself with a smile?

(Don't you get yourself with a smile?)

Oh stop own your suicidal

And tryna your feelin' lighter

So why don't you get yourself with a smile?

(Don't you get yourself with a smile?)



넌 기억 할 지 모르겠지만

우린 비를 맞고 춤을 췄었지

그 순간의 부끄런 표정은

생각보다 나쁘지는 않았어



무더워진 햇살 속에 불던

그 바람 한 번은 시원했지

행복이란 잠시 스쳐만 가고

언제나 깊었어



Oh stop own your suicidal

And tryna your feelin' lighter

So why don't you get yourself with a smile?

(Don't you get yourself with a smile?)



Oh stop own your suicidal

And tryna your feelin' lighter

So why don't you get yourself with a smile?

(Don't you get yourself with a smile?)



Oh stop your act faking lier

That I know your true desire

So why you lost pieces of own your shine?



Oh stop your act faking lier

That I know your true desire

So why you lost pieces of own your shine?



(Oh stop your act faking lier that)

(I know your true desire)

(Oh stop your act fake lier that)
name: Hiro - Getyourself!
